description.description: A short description of the project

homepage.description: A link to the project's homepage

version.description: The version of the package being installed

sha256.description: The SHA256 checksum of the file being downloaded

url.description: The URL to the file being downloaded

caveats.description: Extra information the user should know after installation completes, such as setup information

install.description: The script to run to install the package after downloading

latest.description: The script to run to check the latest version of the package
default: gh release list -R OWNER/REPO --json tagName --jq '.[0].tagName' | cut -c 2-

completions.description: The script to run to install ZSH shell completions for the package
